lines.text: Don't let the situation change you. Change it.
I hope next time we meet, we will be drinking tea.
If you got the guts, drop the gun.
Don't ever make trouble here. Or I'll beat you up each time. Careful, mind the step.
You don't need diamonds in the bathroom.

[shouts]
Stop! Police! Police! Don't move! I shoot you! Don't move!
You don't need diamonds in the bathroom.
